ears::ASSOCRES_T ears::Model1::scoreAll (  )  [virtual]

Implements Model 1 of Balog et. al.

Calculates for each query and entity as follows:

  • For each entity
    1. Construct the entity's language model
    2. Score each query against the entity model: , where is the weight of term in query.

The entity language model is estimated as follows:

  • using Jelinek-Mercer smoothing:
  • using Dirichlet smoothing:

Here, is the number of times term occurs in the entity's textual representation and (i.e., the total number of terms associated with the entity). The collection language model is denoted by .
The raw term counts in the entity's representation are calculated using the following equation: , where is the set of documents associated with the entity and expresses the strength of the association between document and entity .

Implements ears::AssociationModel.
